title: Router: Productionize
description: Routes productionization requests to observability/health/resilience or full service productionize pack.

content.mermaid:
flowchart TD
  Input[productionize] --> Pick{scope?}
  Pick -->|full service| Full[pack.productionize.service.v1]
  Pick -->|observability| Obs[pack.feature.observability.v1]
  Pick -->|health checks| Health[pack.feature.health_checks.v1]
  Pick -->|resilience| Res[pack.feature.resilience.v1]
  Pick -->|unsure| Full
